search_parameters.q: Peter Gabriel, age, music related skills + abilities + occupations, proficiency in each, and current residence location (city, state)

text_blocks.snippet: Peter Gabriel is 75 years old (born February 13, 1950).
He is an multi-faceted artist whose career spans over five decades as a soloist and a member of Genesis.

list.snippet: Singer & Vocalist: Expert. Known for a distinctive, soulful baritone voice with a smooth transition to falsetto. He has described himself as more focused on emotional impact than technical perfection.
Songwriter & Composer: Expert. Highly acclaimed for intelligent, deep lyrics and innovative soundtrack work (e.g., The Last Temptation of Christ, Rabbit-Proof Fence).
Keyboards/Piano: High. He self-taught after early rebellion against formal lessons and uses them as his primary writing tool.
Flute: Proficient. Noted for his theatrical flute playing during the early Genesis era.
Drums/Percussion: Proficient. He began as a drummer in early bands and remains deeply focused on rhythmic experimentation.
Record Producer: Expert. He founded Real World Studios and has produced numerous global and solo projects.
Music Executive & Activist: High. He founded the WOMAD Festival and Real World Records to promote world music.

text_blocks.snippet: He primarily resides in the village of Box, Wiltshire, England, near the city of Bath. He also maintains a residence in West London.
Would you like more information on his innovative use of technology in music or details on his latest album, i/o?
